name: flowy
description: The minimal javascript library to create flowcharts âœ¨
author: Alyssa X

scripts.dist: npm version patch && npm run build
scripts.build: rimraf dist && babel src -d dist && cp package.json dist/ && npm run build:web
scripts.build:web: rimraf dist && parcel build src/engine/index.css -o flowy -d dist && microbundle build -o dist -i src/engine -f cjs,umd,es
scripts.build:demo: rimraf demo && parcel build src/demo/index.html -d demo
scripts.demo: rimraf demo && parcel serve src/demo/index.html -d demo --open
